sentences.en: a definitive agreement to buy the company
sentences.cn: 收购这家公司的最终协议

sentences.en: Clearer fossil may provide a definitive answer.
sentences.cn: 清晰的化石可能会提供明确的答案。

sentences.en: Cysts should be excised and sterilized to avoid ingestion by the definitive host.
sentences.cn: 应该切除包囊并予以销毁,以防止被最终宿主食入.

sentences.en: Definitive diagnosis depends upon either endoscopy or radiology.
sentences.cn: 肯定的诊断有赖于放射学或内腔镜检查.

sentences.en: For atmospheric environments definitive standards have not been published yet.
sentences.cn: 大气环境正式标准尚未发表.

sentences.en: Her book is the definitive works on Milton.
sentences.cn: 她的书是论述密尔顿的定论性著作.

sentences.en: His "An Orkney Tapestry" is still the definitive book on the islands.
sentences.cn: 他的《奥克尼挂毯》一书仍是关于这些岛屿的最权威著作。

sentences.en: I would give this book 5 out of 5 stars. Definitive!
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,我给这本书最高的五星.

sentences.en: In international economics Samuelson has made many definitive contributions.
sentences.cn: 在国际经济学方面,萨缪尔森作出了不少重大贡献.

sentences.en: Please give me a definitive answer.
The Eleventh Edition is the definitive edition.
sentences.cn: 第十一版是最后定稿本.

sentences.en: Theoretical work has enabled definitive statements to be made on these questions.
sentences.cn: 理论上的研究已使这些问题能得到明确的说明.

sentences.en: This book is the definitive guide to world cuisine.
sentences.cn: 这本书是世界美食的权威指南.

sentences.en: We don't need a definitive test to confirm this.
sentences.cn: 我们不需要什么权威检测才能确定(免疫系统问题 )
我们取得了决定性的胜利.

sentences.en: We were producing a definitive edition of the poems of Kipling.
sentences.cn: 我们在出版一部吉卜林诗集的权威版本.

words.tran_cn: 可下定义的；可确定的；可限定的
有定义的，确定的；清晰的，轮廓分明的
最典型的；起决定性作用的
清楚地，当然；明确地，肯定地
确定性，定指；明确；清晰度；梅性
定义；[物] 清晰度；解说
使明确；给...下定义；使...的轮廓分明（define的过去分词）
规定（define的ing形式）；给…下定义；表明特征

trans.tran_cn: 最后的，确定的，决定性的，不可更改的，限定的，明确的，最完整可靠的
trans.tran_en: a definitive book, description etc is considered to be the best and cannot be improved
